data.title: Comics Finder
data.short_description: Searches comics on a simple data set. Uses SvelteKit & Django REST Framework
data.description: This project came to me when I started having a good collection of comics. It was also a good start to make my very first Web App.

data.title: UTT Arena - Tournament organizer
data.short_description: 630 players, 8 tournaments, prizes to be won and tournaments with live commentary by the casters!
data.description: The UTT Arena is back this year for its 20th edition! From a simple examination room at the UTT to 7500mÂ² of gaming at the Troyes Exhibition Centre, the Cube, via the games festival, the UTT Arena has evolved to offer better quality tournaments to its players every year!

data.title: Light 2D Engine
data.short_description: Lightweight 2D C++ Engine based on OpenGL.
data.description: Created during my studies, this projects aimed at understanding how a modern graphical game engine is working.

data.title: Brainstorm Me!
data.short_description: Firefox extension to collect and manage brainstorming data when browsing.
data.description: Brainstorm Me! is a Firefox web extension that allows you to collect brainstorming ideas along your navigation. Just Right-Click on a selected text and choose 'Brainstorm Me!'. It adds the idea to your brainstorming bank so you can edit it later.

data.title: My UTT
data.short_description: Student app for the student website of my school.
data.description: I restarted the development of the new version of the application related to the student website of my school
